location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The correspondence is chronological. A notes section is at the end.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 5; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: Correspondence relating to etiquette:Letter to William Rupert Hay, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf commenting on a list of people to be invited to an 'Arab Dinner', following a discussion with Charles Dalrymple Belgrave, Adviser to the Bahrain Government.extract from a letter by Hugh Weightman, Political Agent, Bahrain, to the Chief Local Representative, Bahrain Petroleum Company, Bahrain, concerning relative precedence between British officials and the Khalifa [Āl Khalīfah] ruling family.
